Text: Kid Stuffwant to sign Eleanor and maybe Alice too up for swim lessons at the Houstonian What is the name of the woman that you liked Also I was looking at a day camp for Eleanor There are the Kidventure camps that look pretty good They do one at the Houstonian Kidventure does but it is full already for the year olds Kidventure also holds a camp at St Annes on Westheimer it appears to not be religiously affiliated if that matters There are some slots still available for the year olds and the year olds if you were interested in Ella also I thought Eleanor would be more comfortable initially if she knew someone since it would be a new place Are you interested in signing Sam and Ella although they would not be together up for a week in late Julyearly August All this stuff is on the Houstonian web cite under the Youth link On another note we enjoyed dinner on Saturday As always the food and company were great I think Phil drank way too much since he was quite hungover on Sunday but other than that no casualties Eleanor slept in until am a first for her I need to get Julie to keep her up later although we were still up at with Alice Sheryl

Halloween FestivalYou forgot the small reminder on the festival Friday Must have been all the football excitment at the end there Anyway the Houstonian carinval thing is Sunday October from pm They request RSVPs at although Im sure theyd let you come anyway There is also a costume party for the bigger kids one of those nights If Ella and Sam were going Im sure Eleanor would love to go Alice is too young I think it might be on that Friday or Saturday night there is info in the MDO on it Have a good week Sheryl Gussett Reliant Resources Inc PO Box Houston Texas fax The preceding email message contains information that is confidential may be protected by the attorneyclient or other applicable privileges and may constitute nonpublic information It is intended to be conveyed only to the designated recipients If you are not an intended recipient of this message please do not read copy or disclose the contents of this communication to others and please notify the sender at If you are not the intended recipient we would appreciate your forwarding the message back to us and deleting it from your system Unauthorized use dissemination distribution or reproduction of this message is strictly prohibited and may be unlawful Thank you
